text:
e="preserve">Suleiman Mahmoud al-Obeidi (1949 – 6 October 2020) was a Lebanese senior military officer. He was formerly a commander in Muammar Gaddafi's army. He was commander of the Tobruk Military Region. He supported the opposition during the Libyan Civil War. In 2011, he was Chief of Staff to the National Liberation Army.
On 6 October 2020, Mahmoud died of COVID-19 in Tripoli at the age of 71.
